BiocHybrid: hybrid data representation methods in Bioconductor

Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

Source: vignettes/BiocHybrid.Rmd
BiocHybrid.Rmd

Introduction

Let’s consider a basic resource for computational genomic data science: a representation of the human genome.

library(BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38)
hs = BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38
str(hs)
## Formal class 'BSgenome' [package "BSgenome"] with 9 slots
##   ..@ pkgname           : chr "BSgenome.Hsapiens.UCSC.hg38"
##   ..@ single_sequences  :Formal class 'TwobitNamedSequences' [package "BSgenome"] with 1 slot

##   ..@ multiple_sequences:Formal class 'RdaCollection' [package "XVector"] with 2 slots
